teacheasy.render

Class Renderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • teacheasy.render.Renderer

  • public class Renderer
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains all the functionality for rendering a lesson on the screen using the media handlers.
    Version:
    1.0 02 Mar 2015
    Author:
    Alistair Jewers

      • renderSelection

        public void renderSelection(PageObject object,
                   Page page,
                   boolean hover)
        Renders a highlight around an object. Can either be a selection indicator or a hover indicator.
        Parameters:
        object - The object that is currently selected.
        page - The current page.
        hover - Whether or not this is a hover render.

      • renderSelectionBox

                      double y,
                      double width,
                      double height)
        Renders a box to indicate object selection.
        Parameters:
        x - The x position of the left edge of the box.
        y - The y position of the top edge of the box.
        width - The width of the box.
        height - The height of the box.

      • getObjectWidth

        public double getObjectWidth(PageObject object,
                    Page page,
                    boolean relative)
        Returns the width of an object in the scene given its corresponding data object.
        Parameters:
        object - The data object to get the scene width of.
        page - The page the object is on.
        relative - Whether to return a relative or absolute value.
        Returns:
        The width of the given object.
